ARABIC: وَٱتَّبِعْ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Follow what has been revealed to you from your Lord. Allah is aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Follow what is revealed to you by your Lord. Verily God is all-knowing and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Verily Allah is fully aware of all that you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Follow what has been revealed to you from your Lord. God is All-aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And keep following what is sent down to you from your Lord; O people! Indeed Allah is seeing your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Verily, Allah is Well-Acquainted with what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And follow what is revealed to you from your Lord; surely Allah is Aware of what you do;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And follow what is revealed to thee from thy Lord; surely God is aware of the things you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And follow that which is inspired in thee from thy Lord. Lo! Allah is Aware of what ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord. God is aware of all that you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And follow that which is revealed to thee from thy Lord; verily Allah is of that which ye Work ever Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is well aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But follow that which comes to thee by inspiration from thy Lord: for Allah is well acquainted with (all) that ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And follow that which is inspired in you from your Lord. Verily, Allah is WellAcquainted with what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord, for Allah is Aware of what they do,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And follow what is revealed to you from your Lord. God is fully aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:2] And follow what is revealed to you from your Lord, namely, the Qur’ān. Truly God is Aware of what you do (ta‘malūna; a variant reading has ya‘malūna, ‘[what] they do’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And follow) Muhammad (that which is inspired in thee from your Lord) act according to what you have been commanded in the Qur'an. (Lo! Allah is Aware of what ye do) whether you honour your pledge or break it.
